maqras.text: 15|50|ware no chōbatsu wa, hontōni tsūkuna chōbatsudearu.' To tsuge shirase nasai.
15|51|Sore kara, iburāhīmu no hinkyaku no koto ni tsuite kare-ra ni katare.
15|52|Kare-ra (hinkyaku no 2 tenshi) ga, kare no tokoro ni haitte kite,`heian'are.' To aisatsu shita toki,`watashi-tachi wa, anata gataga, kowaidesu.' To itta.
15|53|Kare-ra wa itta. `Osoreru koto wanai. Watashi-tachi wa rikōna 1-ri no musuko ga 授Ru kippō o, anata ni motarashita noda.'
15|54|Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa sudeni rōrei ni tasshite iru no ni, anata gata wa watashi ni kippō o kudasaru no ka. Ittai anata gata ni nani no kippō ga arou ka.'
15|55|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, shinri ni yotte kippō o anata ni tsutaeru. Dakara shitsubō shite wa naranai.'
15|56|Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Mayotta-sha no soto wa, dare ga omo no o jihi ni zetsubō shimashou ka.'
15|57|Kare wa (mata) itta. ` (Omo no) shito no kata gata yo, anata gata (ga ko rareta tokoro) no yōken wa, nanideshou ka.'
15|58|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa tsumibukai min ni noko wa sa reta.
15|59|(Daga) rūto no ichizoku wa betsudearu. Watashi-tachi wa, kare-ra no zen'in o kanarazu sukuudearou.
15|60|Daga watashi-tachi no kakunin shite iru kare (rūto) no tsuma wa betsu de, ka no on'na wa haigo ni nokoru hitobito no hitoridearu.'
15|61|Sorekara shito-tachi ga rūto no ichizoku no moto ni kita toki,
15|62|kare wa itta. `Anata gata wa, minarenai kata gatadesu.'
15|63|Kare-ra wa itta. `Iya, watashi-tachi wa kare-ra no utagai o daite iru koto ni kanshite, anata no tokoro ni kita nodearu.
15|64|Watashi-tachi wa shinri o motarashita. Hontōni watashi-tachi wa, shinjitsu o tsugeru.

15|65|Sorede yoru no akenai ma ni, anata no kazoku to issho ni tabidachi nasai. Soshite anata wa mina no ichiban-go kara tsuite iki, anata gata no dare mo ushiro o furimuka sete wa naranai. Tada, meiji rareta tōri ni jikkō shi nasai.'
15|66|Ware ga kono kettei o kare ni shiraseta no wa, nokotta korera no (tsumibukai)-sha-tachi o (yoku) asa horobosu tamedearu.
15|67|Machi no jūmin-tachi wa,(wakamono no nyūsu o kii te) yorokobi ni karitate rarete yattekita.
15|68|Kare (rūto) wa itta. `Kono hō gata wa, watashi no hinkyakudesu. Watashi o hajisarashi ni shinaide kudasai.
15|69|Arrā o osore, watashi ni haji o kaka senaide kudasai.'
15|70|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, gaikoku no mono (o tomeru koto) o, anata ni kinjinakatta ka.'
15|71|Kare wa itta. `Moshi anata gata ga okonaou to surunara, koko ni watashi no musume-tachi ga imasu.'
15|72|(Yogen-sha yo) anata no seimei ni kakete (chikau). Hontōni kare-ra wa kokoro o ran shite, ate mo naku samayou monodearu.
15|73|Sore de hitokoe (chōbatsu) ga, hinode ni kare-ra o osotta.
15|74|Ware wa sono (machi o)-jō o shita ni shite tenpuku shi, yaita doro no ishi o kare-ra no ue ni fura seta.
15|75|Hontōni kono nakaniha chisei aru mono e no, shuju no shirushi ga aru.
15|76|Sono (machi no ato) wa, daidō ni sotte nao sonzai suru.
15|77|Hontōni kono nakaniha shinkō suru mono e no hitotsu no shirushi ga aru.
15|78|Mata mori no nakama mo fugi o okonau monodeatta.
15|79|Sokode ware wa sore ni hōfuku shita. Hontōni kono 2tsu (no ato) wa daidō ni sotte,(ima) akiraka (ni mi rareru no)dearu.
15|80|Hijuru no nakama mo shito-tachi o usotsuki to shite kyohi shita.
15|81|Ware wa kare-ra ni waga shuju no shirushi o kudashitaga, kare-ra wa sorera o sake (te mushi shi)ta.
15|82|Kare-ra wa (iwa) yama ni ie o horikomi, anzendearu to kangaete ita.
15|83|Soredearu Chō, hitokoe (chōbatsu) ga, kare-ra o osotte,
15|84|kare-ra ga (tokubetsu no chishiki to gijutsu de) kizuki itonande ita koto wa, kare-ra ni totte nani mo yakudatanakatta.

15|85|Ware wa ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o, tada shinri ni motodzuite sōzō shita. (Shinpan no)-ji wa hontōni kite iru noda. Dakara anata wa nasakebukaku kan'yō ni (hitobito no kashitsu ya ketten o) yurushite yaru ga ī.
15|86|Hontōni anata no omo wa, ban'yū o sōzō shita zenchi no okata de ara reru.
15|87|Ware wa taezu kurikaesa rerubeki 7tsu (no setsu) to, idaina kuruān o anata ni sazuketa.

15|88|Ano mono-tachi no nan'ninka ni ware ga sazuketa tanoshimi ni taishite urayamashi-sō ni shite wa naranai. Soshite sore ni kokoro o itamete wa naranai. Sore yori anata no tsubasa o hikuku (shite yasashiku) shi nasai.
15|89|Soshite itte yaru ga ī. `Hontōni watashi wa kōmeina keikoku-shadearu.'
15|90|(Keiji o katte ni) bunkatsu shita mono ni taishite mo, ware wa keiji shite oita.
15|91|Sunawachi kuruān o (kare-ra no tsugō no yoi yō ni) danpen ni shita-sha-tachi ni mo.
15|92|Sore de, anata no omo ni chikaite, ware wa kanarazu kare-ra subete o jinmon surudearou.
15|93|Kare-ra ga okonatta subete no koto ni tsui te.
15|94|Dakara anata ga meiji rareta koto o sen'yō shi nasai. Soshite tashinkyō to kara tōzakare.
15|95|Hontōni ware wa, chōshō suru mono ni taishi, anata o jūbun ni mamotte yaru.
15|96|Kare-ra wa, arrā ni soto no kami o haisuruga, mamonaku shirudearou.
15|97|Ware wa kare-ra no kuchi ni suru koto de, anata no mune ga shimetsuke rareru no o shitte iru.
15|98|Dakara, anata no omo o tataete 唱念 Shi, sajida shite,
15|99|sadame no toki ga otozureru made, anata no omo ni tsukae nasai.
